content: original pattern this pattern not the finished product is for personal use only the pattern and photos included are the property of tl crochet distribution and/or reproduction of this pattern is prohibited you may sell your finished products online in your shop or at local markets with pattern credit to tl crochet if you choose to post a finished product please tag my instagram or facebook account you can use #2025temperatureblock when posting so i can see your beautiful work and i can acknowledge it in my stories be sure to join my private pattern instruction group on facebook for help with my patterns and to see the upcoming sales first if you choose to join please answer all questions or admin will decline entry if you purchased this pattern somewhere besides etsy ravelry tlcrochet com or annie s publishing it was most likely pirated and sold illegally please reach out or report to the platform immediately i look forward to seeing all the beautiful color combinations of your finished pieces thank you for your continued support with the purchase of my patterns tracy collins find me email tracylynncrochet@gmail com facebook tl crochet tl crochet group instagram tl crochet website tlcrochet com youtube tl crochet etsy tldotcrochet ravelry tl crochet mrstomcollins tik tok @tlcrochet intermediate skill set gauge half_double_crochet h 5 0 mm crochet hook #4 worsted weight yarn 5 row x 7 sts = 2 2 of 9 materials #4 worsted weight yarn h 5 0 mm crochet hook stitch markers scissors darning needle abbreviations / us terms / english only bpsc - back post single_crochet chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet dc3l - double_crochet in the 3rd loop extfphdc - extended front post half_double_crochet fpdc - front post double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet hdc3l - half_double_crochet in the 3rd loop mc - magic_ring ps - puff r - round single_crochet - single_crochet skip - skip space s - space s st s - stitch es treble_crochet - triple crochet yo - yarn over 3 of 9 notes & tips beginning chain in corners count as a st unless noted otherwise slip_stitch to join rounds does not count as a st all rounds worked from the front no turning pay attention you may not need to fasten_off a round if the next day is the same color there are 13 rounds to each temperature block this will give you 28 blocks for a total of 364 days i will use the 365th day s temperature color for my border this way you can lay out 4 x 7 temperature blocks equally for a blanket and it will be rectangle my temperature blocks measure 12 x 12 each there are several seaming options on youtube as well as borders i m using a 21 color palette in 5 degree increments this year just so i will see a little more color change my full size legend is last page of the pattern i ve never been big on rainbows or rainbow
